name: Chris Lee
text: Quick work and quality repair made to my tonneau cover.

name: Austin K (Zepheros)
text: Hendrick reupholstered the seats on my bar stools. He took the time to explain the different types of fabric/leather he could use, what the pros/cons of each would be and helped me determine what would look best. He did a fantastic job and I would highly recommend him to anyone.

name: Eilyn Rodriguez
text: I went to another shop someone recommended and I was told my chair was a waist of money to repair.   Same day we found Hendricks shop and he took tbe chair right away, show me different options of fabric and it turn out beautiful.  He will take the time and explain everything! We are 100% satisfied

name: Michael Young
text: The guy does a real nice job and he charges less than other shops.  He will  tell you what you need done if you want things to look  the way they  should.

name: Billy
text: Family has known these guys for years. Trustworthy and true craftsman.

name: David Jonas
text: I had Randy re-cover a seat for my motorcycle last week. He was fast and did a beautiful job. The quality of work was much better than I could have hoped. I have been recommending him to anyone that is in need of any kind of trim work. He took great care of me and he backs up his work.

name: Vincent Franchino
text: Unresponsive. Called to request a repair estimate on a tear in a leather couch. I was told they were too busy and I had to bring the couch to them. I was also challenged if it was a real leather couch. Sent a picture of the tear, told I would have a response with in a week, it has been over a month.

name: Amber Matthews
text: Awesome guy. Super easy to work with and gets you what you want... His Upolstery work is amazing..

name: Chris Lee
text: Quick work and quality repair made to my tonneau cover.

name: Amber Matthews
text: Awesome guy. Super easy to work with and gets you what you want... His Upolstery work is amazing..

name: WESLEY DAVISON
text: I took my car to this shop to have the interior gutted so they can clean the seat covers and carpet. I also paid to have the headliner replaced and seat fixed. When I arrived to the car the back seat and plastic interior pieces was broken. The car was still smelling bad. I had to take this car to another shop to get everything fixed and cleaned.

name: Denise Alawine
text: Excellent customer service and outstanding job on my headlights. They look new!  Highly recommend Like Nu. Thanks again, Jamie. Bringing you more work soon.

name: AllDone3
text: Ms. Jamie and Mr. Carter were so nice patient and receptive when I described how I wanted my 88 pickups seat refinished. Used some custom materials and gave them a pretty  good description of what I wanted and they knocked it out of the park ! They even recovered and  foamed my 3 wheeler seat!!! Amazing service!

name: Amanda Baker
text: Jamie and her team do a fantastic job. They replaced the headliner in my 2007 Honda Accord and it looks great. She laid out the costs so there were no hidden fees at the end, and her rates were very competitive. They have a quick turnaround time so that you aren't without your car for too long.  And the shop cat was adorable as well :-)

name: Angela Hurst
text: THIS IS THE PLACE TO GO!Affordable and awesome!! Jamie is so sweet and so helpful.  She taught us how to solve our issue in the future (saving us money on future visits). The moment we stepped out of our vehicle we were greeted and treated like family...lol...it was a pleasant experience.  Thank you for all your help!!

name: henry roberts jr
text: Definitely a friendly place. Mrs.Jamie is very upfront and cares bout the service they provide.

name: donnie edwards
text: OMG!!!! I don’t even know where to start. First I want to thank my coworker for recommending Like Nu. I took my 2008 Cadillac CTS to get a hole repaired in my leather driver seat that was caused by a broken frame. When I went to pick up the car and saw the seat, all I could say is”WOW”.!!!! I can’t even describe the great lengths she went to repair the seat. Not only does the leather look amazing, the frame was fixed and the electric seat works again!!! The prices are very fair and the work is A-1. Jamie and her team are the the greatest at what they do. I would recommend this place to anyone that wants quality work. Thanks again,Jamie.😃😃P.S , very nice family at LIKE NU!!

name: Calvin Turnipseed
text: Took my 2012 Honda Ridgeline in for a new headliner. Jamie was very friendly and professional. My vehicle was ready when promised. It really is “Like Nu” thank y’all for doing quality work and being friendly. I highly recommend this business.

name: Gumbs Messamore
text: You know I like always like the smaller feel of the shops it's more personal but I felt like it was more expensive than it should have been

name: Kyle Ayala
text: I work here

name: Yvonne Kimbrough
text: Had completed work in a timely manner!

name: Jay Day
text: Friendly staff and great pricing. The are currently finishing an upholstery job. I will add more when the repair is complete

name: donnie edwards
text: OMG!!!! I don’t even know where to start. First I want to thank my coworker for recommending Like Nu. I took my 2008 Cadillac CTS to get a hole repaired in my leather driver seat that was caused by a broken frame. When I went to pick up the car and saw the seat, all I could say is”WOW”.!!!! I can’t even describe the great lengths she went to repair the seat. Not only does the leather look amazing, the frame was fixed and the electric seat works again!!! The prices are very fair and the work is A-1. Jamie and her team are the the greatest at what they do. I would recommend this place to anyone that wants quality work. Thanks again,Jamie.😃😃P.S , very nice family at LIKE NU!!

name: abiheags
text: Jamie is so friendly. She helped my mom with her headliner. Price was great and so was the quality of work. Would definitely recommend.

name: Calvin Turnipseed
text: Took my 2012 Honda Ridgeline in for a new headliner. Jamie was very friendly and professional. My vehicle was ready when promised. It really is “Like Nu” thank y’all for doing quality work and being friendly. I highly recommend this business.

name: PAUL HANCERI
text:
Very friendly and professional. Excellent work on my boat upholstery and vehicle too.
Carter and the whole team do great work and have surprised me by completing work ahead of schedule, despite how busy they are.
Thoroughly recommend these guys .

name: Perry Cowart
text: They just completed my boat interior and did a fantastic job. What little we did want addressed they happily did and made sure we were happy. Could not have picked a better place. Highly recommend.

name: Clifford Coleman
text: Like Nu did an AWESOME job on my headliner in my 2005 Buick LeSabre 5 years ago in 2015🙂 I'd recommend them to anyone!!! It still looks great and is holding up well after all these yrs☺

name: Horacio Martinez
text: Overall pretty good service. Had a few details wrong with my truck's interior after they performed their service but was quickly fixed. Friendly staff

name: Sandi Jackson
text: I had my SUV gutted, seats covers cleaned, my carpet cleaned, new headliner, and my rugs dyed to look new on my 2008 Honda Pilot! Great work! Looks new again. Thank you to the staff!

name: Charla Ruby
text: They do Awesome work and are very friendly and polite. I recommend them to anyone😊I am very pleased with my headliner in my truck.

name: J. Morris
text: I recently did business with Like Nu and they rightly deserve 5 stars not only for the quality leather seats they installed in my car, but also for their professionalism. Top of the line service that I'd recommend to anyone!

name: P. T.
text: The people were nice but they do not do vinyl or leather repair on dash or doors.

name: Eric Stanford
text: Very nice experience!! If you have cigarette burns on your roof or car seats this is the place to go. She was very quick and did a great job..

name: Ray Strickland
text: Great job n the new top for my car and the job was done in a timely fashion

name: Jillian Kersten
text: Locally owned business with very friendly owners!  They do excellent work at a very fair price and the work is completed within the time frame they quote you.  I highly recommend and will use them again.

name: Tia Stewart
text: MANDY LEAVES THE BEST MESSAGES ON MY PHONE.  I'M GLAD I GO THERE!!!  THIS IS THE BEST TOUCH UP SHOP IN THE CITY.  THEY ALSO DO GREAT WORK WITH LEATHER AND PAINT

name: marisa wood
text: Do great work but sometimes it takes longer than they say.

name: Jamie Rhodes
text: I love working here. Just hoping I get the chance to make all my customers happy.

name: Demetrus Coleman
text: They did a quality job on my roof head liner for my 2005 Dodge Grand Caravan. Estimate over the phone was more than when I brought it in for a visual estimate. Because of the good job and them also installing back truck shocks (not apart of the original estimate), I paid the amount originally quoted, although they did not require it. Miss Jamie is the person to ask for...

name: Ricky Wiggins
text: very nice people that do great work..

name: Wayne Rooks
text: Fast friendly service and they do great work

name: Sam Tate
text: Great people to deal with did a complete upholstery job on my center console boat looks completely new again thank y'all.

name: Cantrell Norman
text: Like Nu replaced my headliner excellently.  They even looked at it again (a week later) to make sure everything was just how I wanted it. Thank you.

name: Cody Mitchell
text: Excellent people work at the shop I would come here time and time again Cody

name: Amazing Grace
text: Mobile's hidden gem for interior repair! Courteous, polite, and fair...

name: Wheres Paulat
text: .... Hmm idk

resp.text: A better review would help us to serve our customers better. Not sure what we did wrong. Sorry for not making you a happy customer. Wish I knew what went wrong.

name: Etuanda Rox
text: Mannnn.... all I gotta say is " PERFECTION "... I'M OVER SATISFIED!!! Thanks Ms.Jamie!!!

name: Rachna888
text: friendly people ,Jamie fixed the lining of my old torn up 1999 car , made it look brand new again, great service at very reasonable prize  , I would highly recommend this company ,

name: Jamie Rhodes
text: always willing to give our customers our best

name: Gary Brewer
text: outstanding work and very helpful

name: Mark Byrd
text: Good work

name: dan persinger
text: these are my go to people for complete car restorations, can't say enough about how the fix and repair cars,  they really make them like new!

name: B R
text: Norm's Upholstery did a fabulous job with our interior boat cushions and settee upholstery. His valuable information during fabric selection, ensured we picked something that was not only beautiful, but also functional.  We highly recommend them.

name: Noah Gill
text: Great job and highly recommended. I will use them again. Good people.

name: Darrell Lemaster
text: Norms is the only upholstery shop left in Madison County.

name: Eric Phillips
text: Very experienced boat upholter mechanic

name: Gabriel Haroldson
text: I took my 2008 Acura TL to Norm’s to get a quote. He gave me a very far quote and was very friendly. I will be using Norm’s Upholstery from now on very good business.

name: Miki Heaton
text: He has recover my Grandfathers 1900’s barber chair and made a cushion for our swing. He did a great job and was responsibly priced! Highly recommend.

name: Mark Moore
text: For years I used Norm for my boat covers and camper covers. Norm is a excellent person,very competitive and very experienced. I highly recommend him

name: Freddie Louis
text: EXCELLENT SERVICE AND WORKMANSHIP!  WE RECOMMEND TO ALL OF OUR CLIENTS IN NEED OF UPHOLSTERY REPAIR.

name: Dennis Datin
text: He did a headliner for us last year and it was perfect the car was like brand new. Last week I took him two seats from my truck and even though he's busy it is worth the wait to get your upholstery done here

name: Stan
text: Excellent custom work. All upholstery from antique autos, custom autos, boats, furniture, they do it all. Specializing in antique and custom autos.

name: Felipe Garcia
text: The men's toilets are very dirty and rusty, it's disgusting to go in there and the cafeteria is very dirty. I don't know why inspection allows that

name: Jagged wolf
text: I dont advise anyone to ever work their, the place is horrible,check is always short and you are never paid on time or properly. Management is horrible and get upset when you ask where the rest of your check is. Suprised no one had sued them yet.

name: Lena Boo
text: I was a QC best job ever I wish I could come back I love DaeHan Ms.Betty is the best manager there was

name: Brandy Lee Johnson
text: I work here they are friendly caring people.

name: John Mullen
text: Was a fun place to work for a while.. long hrs and low pay.. doesn't get any better than that.. i got a water bottle😁

name: Deon Davis
text: I wouldn't advise nobody to work here i was sent from Vegas my checks was always short  and never on time and as a matter of fact they still ole me and five others I came with over a thousand dollars due to not receiving our last check I worked over 72hrs a week for this company and never got paid correctly they left us homeless and penniless the last straw was when i got cheated out of my hours and when I confronted them about it they never answered they phone they are unorganized and not professional at all it was a man that worked there a month and never got paid so my advice to you don't do it but now me and 6-7others are seeking a lawsuit its been over 3-4 weeks and Mrs Betty still haven't paid us

name: Marcus Darnell Mitchell
text: Hmmmm

name: DShay T
text: The cafeteria stayed nasty. The women restroom had a stinky fishy boo boo odor everyday. A number is listed on their website but no one never answer it. It's been about two weeks that i have worked there and still haven't receive my pay check.

name: Nicole Boswell
text: Modern day slavery be fool to work their don't pay nothing 750 hour.not worth it .Montgomery stop settling for less.these are billionaires

name: Debrar Halcolm
text: Hot

name: t thomas
text: The steak was great!!!

name: Johanan Harris
text: horrible horrible

name: Justin Brooks
text: Bad for business

name: Jose Eduardo Amezcua
text:
(Translated by Google) You want to work 12 hours a day this is the place to do it.

(Original)
Quieres trabajar 12 hrs al día este es el lugar para hacerlo .

name: Blake Stephenson
text: Holt Upholstery has been doing automotive seat coverings for us for over  40 years.  Second generation, family owned business that produces quality work, with competitive pricing.  I highly recommend them for all of your seat cover needs.

name: Joel Smith
text: We had our motorhome sofa recovered. Excellent work done and in the time frame that was promised. A++

name: GORDON HOOD
text: Barry repaired a seat cover that seemed hopeless at a price that was more than fair.

name: Pam Willingham
text: Good service & very friendly people

name: Jim Edgemon
text: The absolute best there is!

name: Austin Haynes
text: They are very courteous, do great work, and in a timely manner.

name: mustang bama
text: Great people and you get what you pay for.

name: Tom Frost
text: Great work on my classic cars...and, I am picky.

name: Julie Riggio
text: Great prices on everything

name: john norman
text: Good work

name: Denise Richards
text: A+++ Had a new convertible top installed on my Benz, couldn't be more satisfied with the timeliness , work performed and attention to detail that Larry and his employees did. I have recommended A1 to all my co-workers , friends and family! Thank you Larry and A1 !!!

name: back inn
text:
These guys are ROCK STARS! They installed new leather seats in our truck and did a fantastic job , we love them!
My wife and I highly recommend A1 !!

PS.  Ms Linda is the sweetest :)

name: Michael Byears
text:
Larry Smith is a great auto interior guy. Does high quality work at reasonable and fair prices. Tell him what you want, don't rush him, respect the man and his art and you will not be disappointed.
I have a perfect 1990 convertible corvette I trusted Larry with. He did some soft top work and put a beautiful vinyl top on my removable hard top as well.
I'll be bringing my wife's Mercedes Sport for an interior freshen up soon.

name: Rogers Tucker
text: Quality of workmanship is top notch and superb! The side panel to my VW Beetle was coming apart, and Larry and Richard replaced it to where it appears to be the original, but better.

name: Denise Bittle
text: Needed a new convertible top for my Volkswagon Beatle. Larry explained everything. Dropped the car off on a Wednesday and Friday morning it was ready!  Superior quality and excellent craftsmanship on the installation!! Thank you, Larry!! I love it!!

name: Darryl Gaitwood
text: Had expensive repairs done that came undone a month later.. can't recommend!

name: Steph Hyde
text: Excellent work, by Larry. Recommend his work. Excellent service recieved.

name: Keith Dickinson
text: Installed new carpet in a Ford pick up, it was better than new.

name: Mellissa Ross
text: Great people, very good work.

name: Debi Gould (mermaid)
text: Perfection in their workmanship, honesty in services.

name: Chris Hunter
text: Great, quality craftsman here!

name: Trevor F
text: What kind of business never answers the phone?

name: Ollis BROWN
text: Does not do liners with bows. No rating.

name: Jason Bryant
text: Good honest people!

name: Leslie Gomez
text: Took my car here after my dog had a little accident in my passenger seat and the before and after is amazing! I wish I had a picture from the before but my car looks good as new. He was very friendly and professional and got it done pretty quickly. This was my first time getting my car detailed so I was very impressed and it exceeded all my expectations! Just alone with how kind he was is enough for me to come back but the job he did was excellent and he seems to really care about his business. If you’re looking for a place, please support your local businesses and bring it here, he will take very good care of you! :)

name: Teresa Powell
text: Took my truck to have it detailed and some upholstery work, this is the place to go, my truck looked like a new truck and the work he did on my driver seat was awesome. Both the guys were very nice. The city Library, Dollar General and the down town square is all in walking distance.  I checked around and Trojan was the cheapest, people say you get what you paid for well, not Trojan you Definitely get more than what you paid for. Well pleased! Try them out!!

name: Edie Jenkins
text: Very professional and very kind. My daughter wanted her car detailed for her birthday and I live in Georgia, she plays softball for Troy and Kerrick cleaned her car like new then delivered her car to the field!! EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE!! Will be doing more business in the future!

name: Brianna McMillian
text: I brought my car on a Monday morning and did not receive my car back until a Friday and the work was done VERY messy! And when he had my car for an whole week; I could not get in touch with him and he did not let me know anything! Plus when I got my car one headlight was out and he refused to fix it! I TOTALLY DO NOT RECOMMEND HE WILL MESS YOUR CAR UP !!!!!!!!

name: Carmi Lowery
text: Kerrick just recently replaced the headliner in my 2004 Honda Accord. He did an outstanding job. The work was nice, clean and completed in under four hours. It's hard to find skilled craftsman anymore! Price was very reasonable.

name: Dawn Sabine
text: Matched the color for our van and completed the headliner replacement in a day!  They did a Great job!! For a reasonable price! Thanks so much!

name: Rob White
text: Very professional.  Got a tip on this place from a local car dealership.  Owner was very nice and courteous.  He reviewed my issue and was quickly able to locate the material I would need.  Turnaround from start to finish was one week and I was only without my vehicle for four hours.  Would recommend this place to anyone.

name: Mac Kim
text: Trojan Upholstery did my daughter headliner in her 2005 Honda Accord and it turn out great. Thanks guys for the great job.

name: Travis Jones
text: Awesome shop very timely and the work is outstanding.  Owner was very knowledgeable about how to keep to originally of the vehicle. If you want to be happy definitely go to Trojan upholstery

name: Jesus Christ
text: Run.. run.. guy cheated me and did not finish the job.  Used Luverne upholstery and they did a great job!!!

name: Kelly Norris
text: Way overpriced and not much attention to detail. If they were another upholstery shop in town I would recommend someone using them

name: k will
text: My door panels were falling down and had became annoying, so I called the guys over at Trojan Upholstery. They scheduled me in for an appointment and I was in and out, in only a few hours.  Thanks Alot!!!

name: Dan
text: I had a car with damage to the front seat and attempted to get an estimate.  Called several times a week for about two weeks with no answer.  The wife finally decided to drive down to the shop to see if we could get find some info in person.  She ended up waiting around for quite a while before someone finally got to her, and the staff seemed rather annoyed that they had to take time out to talk to a customer.  They finally sent someone to look at the car, took some pictures, and told her they would get back to us in a couple days with an estimate.  He was pleasant and professional. That was 24 May. A couple weeks went by and nothing... tried calling multiple times and got no answer.  When someone finally answered, she was extremely unprofessional and quite rude.  We told her our situation, and asked the status of our estimate; she said the one who helped us was new, and that there was no way they were going to get back to us that fast, said it was going to be a while, but couldn't give us any sort of expected response time.  She was snappy, extremely rude, and pretty unprofessional.  19 June and still no response... pretty sure we're headed to Norm's out in Gurley.

resp.text: Hi. Totally apologize. I’m a one man team and I’m overloaded with emails and work. Please send me pictures I will send a quote. 2564680377

name: Tariq
text: These people asked me to send pictures of the job that I needed done, and never called me back with quote. They made me waste my time. I didn't appreciate it. Especially since I asked a lot of questions, and their answers were different than their actions. Good luck with these people!

resp.text: Hi. Totally apologize. I’m a one man team and I’m overloaded with emails and work. Please send me pictures I will send a quote. 2564680377

name: Chris Fisher
text: They never would call me back for a estimate, I'm not going to beg these people to do business with me.

resp.text: Hi. Totally apologize. I’m a one man team and I’m overloaded with emails and work. Please send me pictures I will send a quote. 2564680377

name: John Bryson
text: They were so unprofessional about communicatng on the job I asked them if they could do.  If you asked to speak to manager he is aways out or in abouy to go out.  Very poor service, they wasted so many days with my bed cover to tell me they could not fix, it made me miss an appointment with another place that wanted to try and fix it

resp.text:
Mr. Bryson,
I sincerely apologize for any inconvenience we may have caused. I assure you we have tried our best day in and day out to find another company who could trim down your bed cover since we weren’t able to however we were unable to locate anyone within a 100 mile radius who could get the job done. I’m sorry it had to come to this but hopefully if you cannot get a refund you can find someone with that particular expertise. Thank you for the opportunity and again I do apologize and hopefully one day in the future we can earn back your business.

name: andros thomson
text:
Restored to original condition torn drivers seat in Jeep Altitude! Owner is hands on and he and his team are user friendly! Have already recommended them to my neighbor ! Could not be happier with all aspects of Moore’s Upholstery! Highest recommendation!
Thanks for the great work!

name: Denise Smith
text: Kenneth and his team has a great customer service attitude and they did an outstanding job on a headliner replacement. Not to forget that our truck was ready at the time we were promised. We will definitely repeat our business in the future!

name: Randal Knight
text: Quality and value can't be matched in the area. I took my 2010 Ford F-150 in to get a driver's seat re-upholstered. I wish I would have taken before and after pictures. Looks brand new. Kenneth does great work. Also, Doug in the body department did some touch up paint and body work for me. Again, great work, great price. Will definitely go back for any future needs and highly recommend.

name: 3932L
text: I dropped off my 2001 F250 for the front seat to be reupholstered.  Moore's did a fantastic job and went above and beyond by also re-cushioning the front seat.  And, he was much more affordable than the other places I called.  I will definitely recommend him to others and will be back.

resp.text: Thanks so much! Make sure to visit our new location 2490 Washington St HSV.

name: Matthew M.
text: Excellent upholstery work, would recommend to anyone needing interior work to their vehicle

resp.text: Thanks so much! Make sure to visit our new location 2490 Washington St HSV.

name: William Dunham
text: I had Mr. Moore replace the top on my 2011 convertible.  They did a wonderful job, very friendly crew.  Thank you Mr. Moore.

resp.text: Thanks so much! Make sure to visit our new location 2490 Washington St HSV.

name: J C
text: Great owner does great work.

name: Justin Edge
text: If you ever need something done to your convertible top this is the place

resp.text: Thanks so much! Make sure to visit our new location 2490 Washington St HSV.

name: Chuck Hershiser
text: I am completely satisfied with this company. They did a wonderful job on my front driver side seat cover. Price was very reasonable. Thank you!

name: Matt Holderfield
text: Hands down the best around for your auto and boat upholstery work! Weather it's a small seat repair to an all over interior, this is the guy you want to go to! Amazing customer service, communication was great, work was done quick and professionally!  Thank you for your awesome work! Will definitely be a return customer.

name: Cynthia Blake
text: Barry did a phenomenal job on my car seats. They look amazing. He was fast, reasonably priced, and very professional.  He's THE GUY to go to for all your upholstery needs.

resp.text: Thank you Cynthia. It was a pleasure meeting you, and very happy you found me.

name: David Norrell
text: You need a plane painted ...reupholstered...boats and cars upholstery done...bring it on by

name: Kristen Dunning
text: Excellent service and workmanship! I stopped by to ask if they could repair a bad tear in my Mercedes leather seat. They overnighted the replacement leather and the seat was repaired in 2 hours. The repair is perfect and the seat looks brand new again! Great price and hardly any wait time. The first place I went to had a month long wait and they weren’t sure they could hook up the wiring correctly, after they removed the seat to work on it.

resp.text: Thanks so much Kristen. So happy that we were able to serve you.

name: James jeter
text: Great service! I was getting my top replaced by another shop that kept standing me up on my top. Kept saying one thing then saying they couldn't do it for another 4 weeks after they already got my money. I went and picked up the top and brought it to these guys. They got to my car in less a few days. They did a great job from a top that they don't usually work with being it was ordered by the other shop. It looks very tight and no wrinkles at all and I'm proud that I have finally got my top on. Thank you Matt!

name: chuck jones
text: Great guy's, they do beautiful work. The best!

name: Russell Whisnant
text: They did an excellent job of re-upholstering my boat seat for a very reasonable price. It was cheaper for them to redo the whole thing than it was to pay someone to repair the rips I had. Very impressed and will be back for my other seats. I shopped around several places and these guys had the best pricing, selection, and customer service. I was worried since this was my first time getting marine upholstery done and was pleasantly surprised at how affordable a good reupholster was.

name: Jack Burrell
text: Matt did a fantastic job on my boat seats.  The quality of the material and workmanship was outstanding.  This was a big job, and Matt delivered the finished product quickly at a reasonable price.  He was also a great communicator calling us when necessary and worked with us to find the best options including color and style for our seats. Can’t wait to install them today!  Thanks, Jubilee Auto and Marine Upholstery!  We’ll be back!!

name: JH SULLIVAN
text: Perfectionist after my own heart. Good price, too.

name: Dawn Doiron Staten
text: Excellent friendly and helpful staff. Fair pricing and quality work. We had our toy hauler bench seats done here and they came out great! We brought in the frames and they were very helpful helping us figure out what we needed. The benches are actually better quality than when we bought the toy hauler.

name: Joe Palmer
text: Matt did an outstanding job replacing the convertible top on my Toyota Solara!! Very professional, very thorough and gave me a quick turnaround when I needed my car back fast. I highly recommend this service!!!!!! Very reasonably priced and excellent service!!!

name: Pierce Parker
text: I had a great experience with these guys! I didn’t expect the leather truck seat to be revived with such detail and integrity. I was very impressed as I called around to several places and nobody seemed like they wanted to redoe my father’s seat at all. Most places seemed scared or timid to take on the job. Matt at Jubilee Interiors took on the job, knocked it out of the park, and I’ll be bringing all of my upholstry needs to these guys for now on! 5 stars and I really appreciate the awesome work!

name: MIKE GREGORY
text: Matt replaced my entire boat interior.  Looks better than new!! Great service and a great price.

name: Brian Cain
text: The owner is wonderful. The craftsmanship is the best, you have to use this business.

name: MC Daen
text: New front seats for my Jeep. Quality work at a good price.  Better than new! Thanks!

name: Patterson Branyon
text: Restitched one of my boats seat cushions in minutes and was free.

name: Ricky Trione Art
text: My wife and I are very impressed and very happy with the beautiful new leather upholstery on our seats of our 2005 Honda CRV!  Now our car looks brand new!!!  We highly recommend Jubile Auto Interiors over any other Auto Interior business around the Gulf Coast!!!  Great prices, too!!!

resp.text: Thank you Ricky. We always try to please our great customers.  We really appreciate you.

name: Carl David Winners
text: Great quality and service.  Matt has worked on all my vehicles and my boat, always top quality!

name: Ray Roberts
text:
The best!

Ray

name: James Mc
text: The owner is the man that greets you.  He's knowledgeable, patient, and super friendly.  I'll update my review after the work is done but so far I find them exceptional!

name: Samuel Hubbard
text: Excellent work at a fair price! I had a new headliner put in my Jeep. It was done quickly, professionally, and at a very high quality. If you have need of anything upholstery I can't recommend them enough!

name: Al Beesure
text: People who know what they r doing . At    a get prices thanks again

name: Todd Ayer
text: Excellent work! 3rd time,I jave used them and they didn't disappoint. Quality work, quick turnaround, reasonable price, and very helpful!

name: Elaine Roberts
text:
My husband and I had matching recliners. His broke. We took it to them. He showed us the problem. A part had failed. We were able to order a replacement part for free from where we bought the chair as he knew the chair company covered parts but not labor.  A few days later he called to say it was ready to pick up.

We were very pleased as repair cost much less than buying 2 new recliners.

I agree the place is no showroom but they got our jobs done. They also did upholstery work on our truck and RV.

Not sure why others had problems. I do think they may have a new person as the older man I believe has retired.

name: Ken Kirkland
text: Quality work always

name: Walter Mitchell
text: I had him to do some seat projects for me, we talked about what I had wanted and was understanding that what I had wanted was going to cost!! I told him I wanted it done right and didn't want it look like I had done it and didn't care about price!! Finally of calling him every week for a month he finally was completed. It was originally only going to take a couple of days!! Well the foam isn't 2 inches thick, the material looks cheap, no pipping like we had discussed!! The only thing that wasn't​ messed up was the original price!! If you can't promise someone of a good job, don't take it, simple as that!!!! Very dissatisfied!!

name: mitch sebastian
text: We have used them a few times the past few months and they do great work and have reasonable prices!

name: John Holcomb
text: Great leather couch repair by these gents. The place is a little disorganized, but they got my project done in half the time expected and did a great job!

name: mojo rising
text: Great folks and workmanship

name: Miguel Barcenas
text: Good 🤔

name: B J HAYS
text: Best place for Upholstery
